Title: Prohibits cyber-bullying
Summary: Establishes that any person who knowingly engages in a repeated course of cyberbullying of a minor is guilty of an unclassified misdemeanor punishable by a fine of not more than one thousand dollars, or by a period of imprisonment not to exceed one year, or both.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting cyberbullying
